version_description:
This version includes the following updates: 
* Haven't played World 2 - Shooting Stars (LP1) yet? Get this amazing world with 100 levels of bubble-popping fun for FREE now! 
* Get even more fun with 100 new levels in World 3! 
* Added wide screen support for iPhone 5! 
* Several minor improvements and bug fixes

* Bug fixes
* iCloud support added
Please support us and re-rate the game after each update.

Please support us and re-rate the game after each update

* Several minor improvements and bug fixes
Please support us and re-rate the game after each update

This version includes the following updates: 
* Share your achievements with your Facebook friends!
* Several game play improvements

PLEASE SUPPORT US and review/rate Bubble Bust! on the App Store if you like the game. This helps us to continue adding more great content to the game! 

/GameOn Team
